extendedToolsNYAKDescription.message: This is an extension that adds new features to the People's Map. These features are mainly intended for experienced users.

notOfficialYandexExtension.message: This is not an official Yandex extension

feedbackAndSupport.message: If you have a wish or question, you can ask the developer via Yandex.Messenger. If you know how to fix a bug yourself, please create an Issue in the extension repository or make a Pull request.

moduleSelectionDescription.message: You can choose which functions and modules you need, disabled modules will not be launched while working with the People's Map

addressValidationDescription.message: Adds the ability to check addresses added to Yandex.Maps

favoriteObjectsDescription.message: Includes a block in the left menu with favorite object categories that are available for quick creation

duplicateAddressSearchDescription.message: Searches for duplicate addresses, if found, displays a warning in the address card

roadIntersectionConflictCheckDescription.message: If only 2 roads converge at the intersection of road sections, then an attribute identity check will be performed

profileLinkFromYandexQDescription.message: Adds the ability in Yandex.Q to go to the user's profile in the People's Map

satelliteImageColorCorrectionDescription.message: Adds the ability to adjust the underlay for various parameters

streamAddressCreationDescription.message: Adds the ability to auto-fill the address card using the buttons (-2/-1/+1/+2)

navigateToOtherMapServicesDescription.message: Adds the ability to navigate to another map service

loadAdditionalInformationDescription.message: You can choose what information to display

loadUserSpecialRights.message: Loads information about the user's special rights

renovationFundDataDescription.message: This setting is set in the subsection "Renovation Fund — mos.ru" in the left menu

houseNotInRenovationProgram.message: This house is not in the renovation program.

housesFromStreetInProgram.message: Houses from this street in the program

failedToGetRenovationInfo.message: Failed to get information from the Renovation Fund

houseNumbersNoRoadName.message: House numbers in the list should not contain the road name

banMessageIgnoringComments.message:
Good day, $1!

Unfortunately, you are ignoring the moderator's comments and continue to make mistakes when drawing the map. Please reply to me in [Yandex.Messenger](https://yandex.ru/chat#/) and I will remove the block ahead of schedule.

banDurationUpTo3Days.message: Choose any blocking period, but not more than 3 days

banMessageUnableToContact.message:
Good day, $1!

Unfortunately, I could not contact you via [Yandex.Messenger](https://yandex.ru/chat#/). Please remove the restriction and write to me, after which I will remove the block ahead of schedule.

recommendedBanDuration1Day.message: Recommended ban duration for this reason is one day

banMessageSystematicViolations.message:
Good day, $1!

Unfortunately, you make many mistakes when drawing objects, despite their explanation to you.

Please study the [rules](https://yandex.ru/support/nmaps/) during the blocking period to avoid mistakes in the future.

provideLinksToEditsWithErrors.message: It is advisable to provide links to several edits with errors

reasonForProvidingLinks.message:
This is necessary so that the user better understands what mistakes he made repeatedly.

Links can be indicated after the phrase "... despite their explanation to you." On the next line, you can write "Here are a few examples of them:" and on a new line indicate links to edits with a description of the error.

To ensure that the reason for blocking has a single writing style, it is recommended to use a construction of the form:
— [Brief description of the error](link to the edit)

banMessageProfanity.message:
Good day, $1!

In the People's Map, the use of profanity in comments or profiles is prohibited. Please reconsider your attitude to cartography and study the [rules](https://yandex.ru/support/nmaps/) during the blocking period.

banMessageHateSpeech.message:
Good day, $1!

In the People's Map, the use of statements aimed at inciting hatred or enmity or humiliating the dignity of a person or group of persons is prohibited.

Please reconsider your attitude to cartography and study the [rules](https://yandex.ru/support/nmaps/) during the blocking period.

banMessageVandalism.message:
Good day, $1!

Unfortunately, your edits have been recognized as vandalism, so your profile has been blocked forever.

recommendedBanDurationPermanent.message: Recommended ban duration for this reason is permanent

banMessageDuplicateProfile.message:
Good day, $1!

Unfortunately, your profile has been recognized as a duplicate of another, blocked profile.

provideLinkToOtherProfile.message: It is advisable to provide a link to another profile of this user

reasonForProvidingProfileLink.message:
This is necessary so that in the event of a dispute, it is easier to find a duplicate profile.

The link can be indicated instead of the inscription "blocked profile".

To ensure that the reason for blocking has a single writing style, it is recommended to use a construction of the form: [blocked profile](link to profile)

appealBanMessage.message: You can always appeal the blocking through [support service](https://yandex.ru/support/nmaps/troubleshooting/fb_nmaps.html)

criticalErrorOccurred.message: A critical error occurred in the extension

failedToConnectRenovationFund.message: Failed to connect to the Renovation Fund data server

goToGithubForUpdate.message: Do you want to go to GitHub to download the new version?

houseInRenovationProgram.message: House included in the Renovation Program

resettlementCompleted.message: Resettlement of the house is completed

resettlementCompletedHouseDemolished.message:
Resettlement of the house is completed.
 House demolished

resettlementAtInfoCenter.message: Resettlement of the house is carried out at the Information Center at:

infoCenterClosedContactPrefecture.message: The information center for the resettlement of the house is closed. On the issue of completion of resettlement, you can contact the prefecture of the administrative district.

resettlementNotStartedInfoCenterAddressL.message: Resettlement of the house has not yet begun. The address of the Information Center will be published on the day the resettlement starts.
